alert.note: Alert for Allen; Butler; Edmonson; Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:15PM EDT until July 18 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Logan County in south central Kentucky... Simpson County in south central Kentucky... Western Allen County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Butler County in south central Kentucky... Warren County in south central Kentucky... Southern Edmonson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 314 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Powderly to 8 miles northwest of Springfield to 7 miles northeast of McEwen, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Scottsville, Morgantown, Brownsville, Plum Springs, Memphis Junction, Mount Victor, Crestmoor, Auburn and Smiths Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Butler; Edmonson; Logan; Simpson; Warren
